attributes.action: Have a referendum to rejoin the European Union or Single Market.
attributes.additional_details: Brexit is a failed project peoples right+freedom through the european union has been striped away young peoples future plans were torn apart due to not having a right to vote in the 2016.Its only fair that the Government allows those who could not vote at the time to also now have their say in this matter as well as the general public on expressing their voice on if Brexit is working or failed through a referendum.You say it was a democracratic choice but for the young people it wasn't a choice.
attributes.background:
Brexit has failed, inflations at high time, cost of living is going through the roof and 3 different prime ministers two that no one voted for in a general election.

It is time for brexit to be undone or at least let the UK Citizens/public have a say in this matter through a referendum.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one of the following petitions which call for similar actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636499

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631497
